author: cnbc.com
title: PCM reports 4Q loss
text:
EL SEGUNDO, Calif. (AP) _ PCM Inc. (PCMI) on Wednesday reported a fourth-quarter loss of $2.6 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier.
The El Segundo, California-based company said it had a loss of 22 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 17 cents per share.
The technology and consumer electronics company posted revenue of $563.4 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $3.1 million, or 24 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $2.19 billion.
PCM expects full-year earnings in the range of $2 to $2.10 per share.
PCM shares have dropped 18 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $8.15, a decrease of 71 percent in the last 12 months.
